free_text.Learning outcomes: Present the fundamental concepts of probability and statistics for the engineers' needs.[br/][br/]Familiarise the student with probability calculus and the use of several simple statistical tools.
free_text.Content: [li] Exploratory statistics (Data types; Graphical exploration of variables; numerical summaries of distributions; The boxplot; The normal distribution)[br/][li] Probability calculus (Probabilities of events; Random variables; Characteristic values; Fundamental theorems)[br/][li] Fundamental statistical concepts (Statistical models and parameter estimation; Confidence intervals; Statistical tests; Chi-square significance tests)[br/][li] Linear regression (Introduction; Least-squares principle; Simple linear regression; Multiple linear regression)
free_text.Type of teaching: Ex cathedra lecture, exercises in classroom and to be written at home
free_text.Form of examination: Bonus test during the semester. Written exam (165 min.) during the exam session.
